subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The little right-hander wearing the Bob Feller jersey squeezed the ball, cranked up and let it fly with all his might. He seemed pleased with his heater, until he stepped back and saw the radar reading was only 29 miles an hour.
snippet: The little right-hander wearing the Bob Feller jersey squeezed the ball, cranked up and let it fly with all his might. He seemed pleased with his heater, until he stepped back and saw the radar reading was only 29 miles an hour.
